title: Fintech personal loan sizes decrease as youth borrowing rises: RBI Report
description: More than 59% of the total loans disbursed by fintechs were given to users below the age of 35, and the average ticket size of personal loans decreased to Rs. 9,861 in the first half of fiscal 24, from Rs. 10,955 in fiscal 22. However, delinquency rates are higher among younger age groups.
